comments:
CSS editor throws NullPointerException on attempt to insert new line into CSS if 
there are missed CSS rules appear higer in the file.

How to reproduce: 

1. Create CSS file

BODY {}
BODY, {}
BODY {}

2. Try to enter new line after second rule in CSS editor to get file like 
following:

BODY {}
BODY, {}

BODY {}

I'll take Amy's word for it. Please re-open if you see in M9 level code.
